body: Hoo, naisu ! Tanline tomboy with Fuetakishi artstyle? yes.
please english

This author user to make nice Love Stories and now he's chasing like a gold digger for his popularity. Man, this guy 
takes lot of time for a small chapter with that making time we can watch a Marvel episode every week.
We'll always have the "Fukuyama-san" anthology, at least
Its not netorare, Its cheating
And I thought Fuetakishi will stop making NTR for a change with that previous chapter

I think its quite obvious and sad to say that Fuetakishi has lost his passion or inspiration for hentai, and now he's just chasing the NTR popularity by making multiple low effort/cheap works relased in a short time, with annoying characters, recycled plots and a drastic degradation in his artstyle. Just look at his old works like for example 66773, 40045, 117897, 111040 or even 147323. He stopped to write afterwords or make extra illustration beside his Fanbox after the Elf series, which I believe was the start of his downfall.
Hmm its alright the art isnt anything special smh
Man we still had atleast 4 more girls to come and im sure there will be an amazing orgy at the end 👍

So I’m guessing the artist is retconning the original beginning of this new series by cucking a new addition to the harem and not going back on not cucking his homie who chose to step down for the first broad. Was hoping to see how creative he could get, but I see he’ll just take 3 steps back and copy paste plot from his previous works to save his own ass for the creative talent he obviously lacks.
is it just me or did his artstyle's start degrading
here comes the netori

Seems quite tame.
That's why I said I'm not sure.. Bruh
The two below @DragonStrike123 prolly didn’t read the prequel of this series. And their theories are off point as hell.
It’s most likely NTR, the mc can make any female into his concubine, and they have to agree to it since his an heir to something. There’s a part 1 of this, it exlains it there.

Actually it's neither Netorare nor Hypnosis, it's called Netorase, bc the bf is willing to be cuck, he convinced his gf to have a physical relationship to the other guy. (Not sure tho bc I can't understand Japanese writing) but basing on what I see in the scenes, I can say it's a Netorase

The female character is not averse to sexual intercourse. The male character who was in a lover's relationship with her is also trying to force himself to be convinced about being cuckolded. Because the other guy is an absolute king.
Maybe this work should be considered as a kind of hypnosis, not NTR.
